## Taxonomy
- **Class:** Insecta
- **Order:** Lepidoptera
- **Family:** Hesperiidae

## Occurrence at DeLuca Preserve
Confirmed in 2025 UF DeLuca BioBlitz (Research Grade)

## Conservation & rarity context
- 
- **Rarity note:** Often in open weedy areas; males perch near host grasses

## Natural history notes
Fast-flying skipper; sexes dimorphic; larvae on grasses.
